name: Rahul Mehta
content: Excellent care and professional staff. The doctors took their time to explain everything clearly. Highly recommended!

name: Sunita Rao
content: The hospital has state-of-the-art facilities and the nursing staff is very caring. Thank you for your excellent service.

name: Vikram Singh
content: Had a great experience with my knee replacement surgery. The entire process was smooth and the results are fantastic.

name: Anjali Gupta
content: The pediatric department is amazing. Dr. Reddy is wonderful with kids and very knowledgeable.
